recipe.title: Absinthe Suissesse
ingredients: 1 egg white** or 2 tablespoons pasteurized liquid egg whites (optional)
1/4 cup (2 ounces) heavy cream or half-and-half
*Orgeat syrup is also known by its Italian name, orzata syrup. Camper English prefers orgeat syrup from Torani or Fee Brothers.
**The egg white in this recipe is not cooked. If there is a problem with salmonella in your area omit the egg white or use pasteurized egg whites.
instructions: In cocktail shaker, combine absinthe, orgeat syrup, egg white, orange flower water, and heavy cream or half-and-half. Add ice and shake vigorously for at least 20 seconds. Strain into a chilled highball glass with or without ice from the shaker and serve
